procedure.title: Provision of Consultant Engineering Services to assess dwellings affected by Defective Concrete Blocks in the Inishowen and Stranorlar Municipal Districts, County Donegal
procedure.description:
**Title: Provision of Consultant Engineering Services to Assess Dwellings Affected by Defective Concrete Blocks in the Inishowen and Stranorlar Municipal Districts, County Donegal**

**Description:**
Donegal County Council, the local authority responsible for the development and maintenance of infrastructure in County Donegal, is seeking the provision of consultant engineering services to assess dwellings affected by defective concrete blocks in the Inishowen and Stranorlar Municipal Districts. The successful bidder will be required to conduct thorough assessments of residential properties to identify the extent of damage caused by defective concrete blocks, provide detailed reports on the condition of each dwelling, and offer recommendations for necessary repairs or replacements. The consultant will work closely with the council to ensure compliance with all relevant building regulations and safety standards. The services will include but are not limited to:

- **Site Assessments:** Conducting on-site inspections to identify dwellings affected by defective concrete blocks.
- **Condition Reports:** Preparing detailed reports on the condition of each dwelling, including the extent of damage and necessary repairs.
- **Recommendations:** Providing recommendations for repairs or replacements, ensuring compliance with building regulations and safety standards.
- **Collaboration:** Working closely with Donegal County Council to implement the assessment and repair plans.
- **Documentation:** Maintaining accurate records of all assessments, reports, and recommendations.

The consultant should have expertise in structural engineering, building inspection, and report writing. The ability to work independently and collaboratively with local authorities is essential. The successful bidder will be expected to adhere to the highest standards of professionalism and deliver high-quality services that ensure the safety and well-being of residents in the affected areas. 

**Additional Requirements:**
- **Experience:** Demonstrated experience in conducting similar assessments and providing detailed reports.
- **Qualifications:** Relevant qualifications in structural engineering or a related field.
- **Certifications:** Any necessary certifications or licenses to practice in Ireland.
- **Insurance:** Proof of professional indemnity insurance.
- **Timeline:** The project timeline should include clear milestones for completion of assessments and submission of reports.

By engaging a suitable consultant, Donegal County Council aims to ensure the safety and integrity of residential properties in the Inishowen and Stranorlar Municipal Districts, thereby protecting the health and well-being of its residents.
